Package com.pokego.datamodel

Class GameText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokego.datamodel.GameSpriteGroup
      • com.pokego.datamodel.GameText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovable
    public class GameText
extends GameSpriteGroup
    GameText represents text that is rendered by LibGDX's engine. The GameText is implemented using BitmapFonts and GlyphLayouts. The available fonts are specified by the Font enum. Font paths are found in the "./assets/fonts" folder. New .fnt files can be generated using Hiero.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameText

        public GameText()
        Constructs the GameText with a (0,0) position. Uses the default font and default font color.

      • GameText

        public GameText​(Font font)
        Constructs the GameText with a (0,0) position and a specified font. Uses the default font color.
        Parameters:
        font - Font to use, found in the Font enum.

      • GameText

        public GameText​(Font font,
                com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fontColor)
        Constructs the GameText with a (0,0) position, a specified font and default font color.
        Parameters:
        font - Font to use, found in the Font enum.
        fontColor - Color of font, uses LibGDX's Color class.

      • GameText

        public GameText​(int x,
                int y,
                Font font,
                com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color,
                float scale)
        Constructs the GameText with a (x,y) position, a specified font and default font color. Also specifies the scale of the font.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the GameText.
        y - The x position of the GameText.
        font - Font to use, found in the Font enum.
        color - Color of font, uses LibGDX's Color class.
        scale - Size of font.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sb)
        Draw font using LibGDX's engine. Displays font.
        Specified by:
        draw in class GameSpriteGroup
        Parameters:
        sb - SpriteBatch

      • draw

        public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sb,
                 float targetWidth,
                 int alignment,
                 boolean wrap)
        Draws font with specific alignment using LibGDX's engine. Displays font.
        Parameters:
        sb - SpriteBatch
        targetWidth - How large the text grows before wrapping. To wrap at end of screen, put screen width.
        alignment - Align left, center or right. Uses LibGDX's Align util.
        wrap - Specifies whether to wrap text. True to wrap, False otherwise.

      • dispose

        Frees up memory by disposing sprites from SpriteBatch.
